title: Perpignan, Gitanos
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Adrien Dauzats [1804-1868], Paris, France; sale, Vente Dauzats, Paris, France, February 1-4, 1869. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. Vente Dauzats (Lugt 653) is stamped on the drawing (recto, lower left.) 
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, ÃŽle-de-France, France)
